text: Denis Diderot (; 5 October 1713 – 31 July 1784) was a French philosopher, art critic and writer. He was a known figure during the Enlightenment. He is best known for serving as co-founder, chief editor and contributor to the Encyclopédie along with Jean le Rond d'Alembert.Jacques Smietanski, "Le Réalisme dans Jacques le Fataliste" (Paris: Nizet, 1965). Born into a noble, Catholic family, in later years he rebelled, becoming an Atheist.
